title: Ex-Post Office chairman hits back at Badenoch after ‘astonishing’ bullying claims
description: Spokesperson for Henry Staunton says Commons statement by Ms Badenoch was 'first time' any investigation into bullying claims had been mentioned

title: Birmingham City Council reveal details of massive budget cuts to young people's services
description: Birmingham City Council has finally revealed how it will slash services for children, young people and families amid its alarming financial crisis.

title: Cost of living fears rife in election battleground

title: Tories accused of failing parents as cost of childcare rises faster than inflation
description: Analysis by the Labour Party shows the price of a part-time nursery place has jumped from £82 per week in 2010 to £146 now.

title: Tories thwarted in budget ploy to save Aquarium roundabout
description: The Tories called on the Labour-run council scrap the scheme before the “budget council” meeting on Thursday (22 February). They want to use £1 million from the capital budget for the Valley Gardens project on other transport projects such as fixing ...

title: Angry motorists urge Chancellor Jeremy Hunt to make more cuts to fuel duty in Budget

title: Debate the triple lock all you want, but UK needs to solve pensioner poverty

title: Sunak bids to win back support of British farmers
description: The governing party won 96 of the 100 most rural seats in England in 2019 but is on track to lose more than half of those to Labour and the Liberal Democrats, according to a poll by Survation, commissioned by the Country Land and Business Association.

title: PM to tell farming conference Government is ‘by their side’
description: His speech comes in the wake of polling which found Labour had narrowly overtaken the Tories among countryside voters, who also felt neither main party understood rural communities. Farmers have been dealing with the impacts of soaring costs of inputs ...

title: Fruit-picking robots could slash the need for migrant labour, Rishi Sunak to tell farmers as he unveils £220 million fund for new technology
description: Fruit-picking robots could slash the need for migrant labour, Rishi Sunak will tell farmers today. Addressing the National Farmers' Union conference, the Prime Minister will unveil a £220 million fund to help deploy new technology to help boost ...
